INP3000 Programmer Board

VERSION 3.0

Figure 3: INP3000 programmer kit contents - version 3.0

Table 2 provides the description of each Connector on the board:

Table 2: INP3000 ver 3.0 Connectors with description

Connector

Description

J14

4 PIN UART PROGRAMMING CABLE which includes RTS and CTS

J12

2 PIN UART PROGRAMMING CABLE

J13

SPI Programming header

J3

GPIO headers

J6

JTAG header

SW1

UART/SPI programming interface selector

J8

EXTRA FTDI PIN headers

X1

USB Micro B Connector

Connector J12 (2 PIN UART HEADER) Pin-out table:

Table 3: 2PIN UART HEADER

J12

Description

1

GND

2

EN_CHIP/_RST

3

GPIO1/TXD

4

GPIO2/RXD

5

GPIO17_CONSOLE_RX

6

GND

Table 4: SPI HEADER

J13

Description

1

GND

2

3

GPIO0_SPI_CLK

4

GPIO1_SPI_MOSI

5

GPIO2_SPI_MISO

6

GPIO5_SPI_CS

7

GPIO17_CONSOLE_RX

8

GND

Figure 5: Connectors for application board

Use the mating connector on the Molex cable connected to FTDI board version 3.0 in Figure 5 to independently program the Talaria TWO module.
